description: Application services for Cincom Visualworks Platform for Finance
full_summary:
# Advance Contract Award Notice for Software Support for VisualWorks UFS

## Notice Details

* Reference Number: cb-696-22250503
* Tender Number: 24-802
* Tender Status: Expired
* Publication Date: 2024-01-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-12T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2028-02-29

## Bid Description

Export Development Canada (EDC) is seeking a contractor to provide software engineering support for its Treasury’s Cincom VisualWorks development platform and Universal Finance Server (UFS) application. 

The Treasury Group and Corporate Banking, along with other financial departments at EDC, rely heavily on UFS, a legacy system that has been in use for over two decades. This system has been customized extensively and is used to record, manage, control, and facilitate the execution of specific financial transactions.

The contractor will be responsible for providing support for the Cincom VisualWorks software development platform and UFS-related applications, including:

* Design, development, deployment, and maintenance of applications written in Cincom SmallTalk
* Resolving technical issues with the Cincom VisualWorks software development platform and UFS-related applications
* Identifying and implementing improvements and extensions to core UFS frameworks and the core VisualWorks code base
* Collaborating with business teams to assess current work processes and propose, review, develop, and deliver UFS application solutions

The contractor must also understand corporate cyber-security issues and respond accordingly.

## Important Documents

Please refer to the attached documents for more information.


## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Steve Marin
solicitations@edc.ca
(613) 597-8863
